content: Awesome man! Already found solutions for some of it and some are I learn. Thank you man. There is one/two more problem I wanted to address: Duplicate artboard takes the same name (Cmd + V) which create problem when we export to PNG and result, they export only one by default, or they export both but I see one file within the destination folder Solution: Instead of copy and paste Artboard (cmd + V), Use Alt + Drag(Click) and duplicate artboard got copy at the end of name I hope above one solution helpful to my fellow designers.
